backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles and contact submissions with access control and admin‑restricted retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two header‑related features to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short descriptions of all frontend files and their roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining color tokens and dark‑mode styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the site slug and loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App component that mounts the landing page and performs hash‑based auto‑scroll.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Validated contact form component submitting contact data via React Query.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About section highlighting service features with icons.
frontend/src/components/sections/Advisor: Advisor profile section with portrait, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Contact section combining contact info cards and the contact form.
frontend/src/components/sections/Coverag: Displays a grid of coverage items with icons and descriptions inside a styled section.
frontend/src/components/sections/FaqSect: Renders an accordion of FAQs with questions and answers in a styled section.
frontend/src/components/sections/FooterS: Shows footer info including branding, contact details, copyright, and a caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeaderT: Provides a sticky top bar with branding, advisor info, and a call button.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Creates a hero banner with headline, description, call/WhatsApp buttons, and an illustration.
frontend/src/components/sections/PlanOpt: Displays health insurance plan options in cards with icons and titles.
frontend/src/components/sections/TataAig: Presents TATA AIG plan overview with benefits listed inside a card.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhyChoo: Shows reasons to choose the service using icon-feature cards in a gradient section.
frontend/src/components/SecureHealthKera: Composes all landing page sections including header, content sections, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, auto-refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a mutation hook to submit contact data via the actor and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Contains Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining brand colors, themes, and utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/utils/siteSlug.ts: Defines a fixed site slug and provides validation and retrieval helpers with a fallback slug.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL and session-based parameters, supporting hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the current project state, requirements, branding details, and known issues for the Secure Health Kerala site.
